title: Awareness and knowledge of attention deficit and hyperactivity disorder among medical students of Qassim University in Saudi Arabia
abstract: Background: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a common neurodevelopmental disorder that affects multiple aspects of an individualâ€™s life. It is characterized by attention deficit, hyperactivity, and impulsivity. As it is linked to various comorbidities, individuals and families often find it difficult to cope with it. Therefore, early diagnosis and intervention are vital.
